alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oglala Lakota County through 445 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Rockyford, or 32 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rockyford and Lonesome Valley around 425 PM MDT. Thunder Valley around 430 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sharps Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
